data.title: PRTG Network Monitor - Data Analysis - (tools-monitor.data.cr)
data.text:
PRTG Manual: Data Storage

PRTG stores the monitoring configuration, monitoring data, logs, ToDos, and reports as well as support and debug data into different folders on the core server or the system running a Remote Probe. Additionally, there is data from PRTG in the program directory and the Windows registry.

Data can be found in different locations. For a detailed information please see the article linked in the More section below.

PRTG Program Directory

32 bit systems:

%programfiles%\PRTG Network Monitor

64 bit systems:

%programfiles(x86)%\PRTG Network Monitor

PRTG Data Folder

%ALLUSERSPROFILE%\Application data\Paessler\PRTG Network Monitor

Windows Registry

System settings on 32 bit systems:

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Paessler\PRTG Network Monitor

System settings on 64 bit systems:

HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Paessler\PRTG Network Monitor

Enterprise Console settings:

HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Paessler\PRTG Network Monitor\WinGUI

More

Knowledge Base: How PRTG Network Monitor Stores its Data

http://www.paessler.com/knowledgebase/en/topic/463
